alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:16PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN INDIANA... SOUTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND AND NORTHEASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM EDT... At 916 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lawson Heights, or near Latrobe, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greensburg, Latrobe, Mount Pleasant, Scottdale, McChesneytown-Loyalhanna, Blairsville, Youngwood, Derry, Lawson Heights, New Stanton, Ligonier, and Black Lick. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania near mile marker 57. Pennsylvania Turnpike between mile markers 75 and 99. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for southwestern and west central Pennsylvania.

area.areaDesc: Fayette; Fayette Ridges; Higher Elevations of Indiana; Indiana; Westmoreland; Westmoreland Ridges
